branchCategory.name: LEL Electric Actuator/Guide Rod Slider, Belt Drive, Step Motor (Servo/24 VDC)
branchCategory.description: An LEL slider type electric actuator features a load mounting carriage that travels on guide rails. The parallel belt drive and horizontally mounted motor offer a surface height lower than comparable LEF models. The belt drive offers higher speeds than a ball screw drive, while the construction offers the lowest cost.

breadCrumb.name: LEL Electric Actuator/Guide Rod Slider, Belt Drive, Step Motor (Servo/24 VDC)
